trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element that corresponds to the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetTcpContextBinding"></xref> binding.
The XML element that corresponds to the `NetTcpContextBindingElement` can be used in the application configuration file under the `system.serviceModel/bindings/netTcpContextBinding` node.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetTcpContextBindingElement"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetTcpContextBindingElement"></xref> class with the specified configuration name.
The configuration name of the binding.
The value should be unique because it is used as identification for the binding.
name is `null`.
A configuration element with the specified name does not exist.
Gets the CLR type of the standard binding associated with the configuration element `System.ServiceModel.NetTcpContextBinding`.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that specifies the CLR type of the standard binding associated with the configuration element `System.ServiceModel.NetTcpContextBinding`
Gets or sets the client callback address for the binding element.
Returns <xref href="System.Uri"></xref>, which contains the client callback address..
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether context management is enabled.
`true` if context management is enabled; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the desired protection level of the SOAP header used to propagate the context information.
The default value is `ProtectionLevel.Sign`.
A valid <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"></xref> value.
Initializes this binding configuration element based on the configuration of the specified binding.
The binding object supplied must be of type <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetTcpContextBinding"></xref>.
The binding that contains the content and context protection level used to initialize the class.
Applies the configuration of this configuration element to the specified binding instance.
The binding instance supplied must be of type <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetTcpContextBinding"></xref>.
The binding to be applied.

Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetTcpContextBindingElement.ContextProtectionLevel%2A> property is also contained in this property collection.

A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.
